banner.title: Transform Your Career in the World of Financial Leadership
banner.description: At VGC Advisors, we partner with MSMEs and growing businesses to drive financial clarity, compliance, and growth. Join us and be part of a mission that impacts business owners, their teams, and communities.

applicationForm.title: What Are You Looking for in your Next Job
applicationForm.subtitle: Apply Now For Success

whyWorkWithUs.title: Why Work With Us
items: At VGC Advisors Private Limited, we believe in the Win–Win–Win strategy:
Client Satisfaction above all else.
Team Empowerment for collective growth.
Owner's Success as our shared goal.

whatWeOffer.title: What we offer:
items: Impact-Driven Work: Help MSMEs achieve sustainable, profitable growth.
Strong Mentorship: Learn directly from Chartered Accountants, Business Analysts, and corporate finance experts.
Professional Growth Path: From Junior to Senior roles, Partner, and HOD.
Continuous Learning: Industry-leading training and exposure to complex finance, tax, and compliance projects.

culture.title: Our Culture & Values
items: You will thrive here if you:
Take ownership and show high accountability.
Love solving problems and improving processes.
Value accuracy, compliance, and timely delivery.

notForYou.title: This may not be for you if you:
items: Avoid client interaction.
Struggle with deadlines or long hours.
Dislike financial operations or managing people.

nonNegotiables.title: Non-Negotiables:
items: 100% Office Presence (No Remote).
6-Day Work Week.
9–10 hour workdays (flexible based on workload).

lifeAtVGC.title: Life at VGG
items: We are a fast-growing consulting firm that thrives on collaboration, innovation, and results. Our work environment is:
Supportive & Collaborative: Open communication with management.
Growth-Oriented: Opportunities for skill upgrades, leadership roles, and ESOP-based wealth creation.
Engaging: Training sessions, team tours, celebrations, and professional networking.

positions.title: Senior Accountant
responsibilities: Manage end-to-end accounting operations & annual audits.
Full ownership of tax & compliance processes.
Prepare and develop MIS reports for management.
idealFor: Professionals comfortable with finance operations, client calls, and team management.

positions.title: Account Manager
responsibilities: Lead and mentor the accounting team.
Improve accounting processes and operational efficiency.
Manage client relationships and ensure timely service delivery.

positions.title: Junior Accountant
responsibilities: Support senior team members in accounting & compliance tasks.
Learn business planning, budgeting, and financial analysis.
idealFor: Freshers or early-career professionals looking to grow into senior finance roles.

benefits.title: Benefits & Perks
items: Competitive salaries & bonuses.
ESOP opportunities for wealth creation.
Professional coaching & industry exposure.
Structured training resources.
Work directly with decision-makers.
